questions.question_text: An administrator creating an exclusion is limited to applying a rule to how many groups of hosts?

choices.D: Each exclusion can be aligned to only one group of hosts
choices.A: File exclusions are not aligned to groups or hosts
choices.C: There is no limit and exclusions can be applied to any or all groups
choices.B: There is a limit of three groups of hosts applied to any exclusion
